pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides a command line tool to get metadata for an academic paperposted at arXiv.org in BibTeX format.Transform this:: $ arxiv2bib 1001.1001Into this:: @article{1001.1001v1, Author = {Philip G. Judge}, Title = {The chromosphere: gateway to the corona, or the purgatory of solar physics?}, Eprint = {1001.1001v1}, ArchivePrefix = {arXiv}, PrimaryClass = {astro-ph.SR}, Abstract = {I outline curious observations which I personally find puzzling and deserving of attention.}, Year = {2010}, Month = {Jan} }
